resources.string: Needs permission for camera and audio recording.
Please turn on your internet connection
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API
please fill the form to add new mission

Video Streaming

 • Only work for LANDSCAPE mode
 • To stream video need network connection - 3G/4G
 • You can change the resolution of video
 • Changing video size cause for streaming
